column4: of course, given that I have essentially a fresh install of Feisty, I suppose I could just take the slightly longer but simpler approach of just reinstalling Fieisty and let the install process put grub back in
it's linux that is not very friendly!
or rather, as the old adage goes, "it's not that linux isnt user-friendly, it's just that it's very selective about who his friends are"
